name: kMDItemAppleLoopDescriptors
description: Specifies multiple pieces of descriptive information about a loop.

name: kMDItemAppleLoopsKeyFilterType
description: Specifies key filtering information about a loop. Loops are matched against projects that often in a major or minor key.

name: kMDItemAppleLoopsLoopMode
description: Specifies how a file should be played.

name: kMDItemAppleLoopsRootKey
description: Specifies the loop's original key. The key is the root note or tonic for the loop, and does not include the scale type.

name: kMDItemAudioChannelCount
description: Number of channels in the audio data contained in the file.

name: kMDItemAudioEncodingApplication
description: The name of the application that encoded the data contained in the audio file.

name: kMDItemAudioSampleRate
description: Sample rate of the audio data contained in the file. The sample rate is a float value representing hz (audio_frames/second). For example: 44100. 0, 22254. 54.

name: kMDItemAudioTrackNumber
description: The track number of a song or composition when it is part of an album.

name: kMDItemComposer
description: The composer of the music contained in the audio file.

name: kMDItemIsGeneralMIDISequence
description: Indicates whether the MIDI sequence contained in the file is setup for use with a General MIDI device.

name: kMDItemKeySignature
description: The key of the music contained in the audio file. For example: C, Dm, F#m, Bb.

name: kMDItemLyricist
description: The lyricist, or text writer, of the music contained in the audio file.

name: kMDItemMusicalGenre
description: The musical genre of the song or composition contained in the audio file. For example: Jazz, Pop, Rock, Classical.

name: kMDItemMusicalInstrumentCategory
description: Specifies the category of an instrument.

name: kMDItemMusicalInstrumentName
description: Specifies the name of instrument relative to the instrument category.

name: kMDItemRecordingDate
description: The recording date of the song or composition.

name: kMDItemRecordingYear
description: Indicates the year the item was recorded. For example, 1964, 2003, etc.

name: kMDItemTempo
description: A float value that specifies the beats per minute of the music contained in the audio file.

name: kMDItemTimeSignature
description: The time signature of the musical composition contained in the audio/MIDI file. For example: "4/4", "7/8".
